Room.Name: Bear Marked Tree
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing below a slash mark on a giant redwood tree.
Room.LongDescription: The mark is easily a meter over your head, and was no doubt put there by a bear defining his territory. There is a rope bridge to the west, evidently leading to a cave you see in the distance. That may be the cave of the hermit who inhabits this part of the forest. If he is willing to talk to you, he may tell you some of the secrets of this place.
